content:
There is a grey pen icon to the right of the topic headings in others' recent posts. By clicking this, I seem to be able to edit others' topics. (@Ricardo Chavarriaga (CLAIRE Office Switzerland) @Josef Urban )

I am writing this test message to see if I'm given an option to disable that. So far, I don't see that option, suggesting that it's an option that CLAIRE needs to set.

I give my permission to anyone who wants to try to edit the post's topic.

Thanks for pointing this out @Colin Rowat !
A quick internet search fixed the issue. I guess we never noticed because the community is so polite :grinning:
